Name: Age of Pixels
About the game: Build your base, train you army and crush your enemy! Welcome to Age of Pixels , the fast paced , (very) retro-looking RTS you have been waiting for! Attack and defend with more than 20 different units , 17 buildings and custom heroes (with active and passive abilities!). Play however you want on procedurally generated maps or user made and included custom maps , alone against the AI or with a friend in LAN , on official and custom campaigns! Create your worlds With the included map editor and make them interactive like never before with the advanced triggers system ! Create your stories With the included campaign editor! Share your creations with the community thanks to the power of the Steam Workshop! List of Features: Crush your enemy using more than 20 different units ! Exploit unusual abilities and creative tactics to win! Build your base with 17 different buildings ! Create your own custom heroes ! Kill the enemy King in Regicide mode! Destroy the enemy Obelisk in Siege mode! more than 20 songs in the soundtrack! Upgrade your units! play againts the AI or your friends in local (LAN) multiplayer ! Play on Procedurally generated maps (with customizable parameters!) Play on Custom maps! play on official and user made campaigns! Download user made maps from the Steam Workshop! Create new maps & campaigns in the map & campaign editors! Share your own custom maps & campaigns with the community!
